textSection1.text: Interested in finding out how Arrivy can help your business?

items.heading: Schedule work for Team
items.text: Schedule work on your calendar in Arrivy and assign it to crew members. Crew members can see their tasks on easy-to-use mobile apps.

items.heading: Track your Crew
items.text: See live location of drivers in real-time on a map. No GPS required.

items.heading: Ratings & Reviews
items.text: Enable customers to rate you easily on Facebook, Yelp, Google, Arrivy etc. on task completion and get more business.

items.heading: Enable Customers to track Orders
items.text: Your customers can track their orders with real-time estimates and Email / SMS notifications.

items.heading: Mobile apps for your Crew
items.text: Keep connected with your crew/drivers on the go to check on orders, report status and interact with customers.

items.heading: Enterprise APIs
items.text: Arrivy in an API first platform. Power your own systems, apps and front-ends with real-time tracking and status features using our eco-system.

items.heading: Home Services
items.text: Schedule work for your crew in advance. Enable the crew to see their calendars on the go. Let your customers exactly know when your work crew will arrive. We power Cleaning businesses, Garage door repair companies, HVAC etc.

items.heading: Delivery Companies
items.text: Track where your drivers/crew members are and direct them to your customers. Enable customers to see driver's location in real-time.

items.heading: GDS Atlanta
items.text: "Our team loves Arrivy, because it makes everyone's job easier. Our time communicating with customers and each other is cut to a fraction of what it used to be since Arrivy completely automates communication. Most importantly, we are providing a better experience for our customers, and this turns into repeat customers for our business."

items.heading: Arrivy User
items.text: "We've seen a BIG increase in positive customer reviews"

qq.header: How do I choose a Monthly Plan?
qq.content: Estimate your usage to pick a plan. You can switch plans any time and its always backdated to the start of your billing period.

qq.header: How do I pay for Arrivy usage?
qq.content: You are billed at a 30 days cycle based on your signup date, chosen plan and usage.
